reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Hair Savior: K18 Peptide Prep™ Smoothing pH Maintenance Color-Safe Shampoo
reviews.reviewText: I am thrilled to share my experience with the K18 Peptide Prep™ Smoothing pH Maintenance Color-Safe Shampoo, and I can confidently say that I love it! This daily-use shampoo has become a game-changer in my hair care routine for several compelling reasons.Revolutionary Peptide Technology:The standout feature of this shampoo is the incorporation of revolutionary peptide technology. My hair feels transformed with each wash, appearing healthier, shinier, and more resilient. The peptides work wonders in repairing and strengthening the hair, leaving me with improved texture and manageability.Smoothing and Color-Safe Formula:The smoothing formula lives up to its promise, taming frizz and making my hair sleek. As someone with color-treated hair, I appreciate that it is color-safe, preserving the vibrancy of my hair while addressing common concerns like frizz and damage.Daily Use without Stripping:Unlike some daily-use shampoos, the K18 Peptide Prep™ maintains the perfect balance of effectiveness without stripping the hair of its natural oils. It's gentle yet powerful, allowing me to use it daily without worrying about over-drying or compromising the health of my hair.pH Maintenance for Optimal Health:The commitment to pH maintenance is evident in the exceptional health of my hair. The shampoo helps restore and maintain the optimal pH level, contributing to a healthy scalp and overall hair vitality. It's a holistic approach to hair care that sets this product apart.Delightful Fragrance and Lather:The shampoo boasts a delightful fragrance that elevates the entire washing experience. The lather is rich and luxurious, creating a spa-like atmosphere in my shower. The sensory aspect adds an extra layer of indulgence to my daily routine.Noticeable Results:After consistent use, I've noticed a remarkable difference in my hair's overall health and appearance. It feels firmer, smoother, and more resilient, making the K18 Peptide Prep™ a true hero in my hair care arsenal.In conclusion, the K18 Peptide Prep™ Smoothing pH Maintenance Color-Safe Shampoo has exceeded my expectations. It's a luxurious and practical daily-use shampoo that delivers on its promises, leaving me with hair that looks and feels fantastic. I wholeheartedly recommend it to anyone searching for a transformative and nourishing shampoo for daily use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This shampoo is very cleansing and my hair felt very clean after first use. This shampoo is gentle enough to able to be used multiple times a week. It has a really good scent and my hair feels soft and is very shiney after use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Hairdresser used on my friend last time they were there, and they liked it; so, I got it for them. Seems to clean well and leaves hair soft when used with the company's leave in conditioner. A bit pricey, but seems worth it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Repaired my hair!
reviews.reviewText: I like this product because it repaired my hair from a break off nightmare.The product does not dry out my hair.It leaves it soft and silky and manageable.I would recommend this product to anybody anybody that is having trouble with break off or dried out hair. It also has helped reduce frizz.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I could tell a difference in 1 wash
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this product as recommended by someone off social media. I needed a clarifying shampoo and this product works well! My hair is so soft and shiny after just one use. I'm excited to try other products in this line.It lathers up a lot if that means anything to anyone. I didn't mind either way

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Clean and soft hair
reviews.reviewText: Ive been using this shampoo as a daily one for the past 3 weeks and I can definitely see the difference. It cleans the scalp so well and makes your hair feel so soft. It is an amazing product but I totally would see why so people debate on buying it because of the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Products combined destroyed my hair.
reviews.reviewText: Whatever this product did, my hair started falling out by the handful. All broken and destroyed. Maybe it was the clarifying shampoo? Maybe the treatment? One thing might be undermining the strength of the other? No idea but I myself am done with this now. This regime did not help at all and hurt greatly. They need to get down to the basics of what they have faith in and not pile on products they dont' have faith in as something here really hurt my hair. I'm done. This science is clearly not perfected. They need to figure this brand out.

Having recently incorporated the K18 Peptide Prep pH Maintenance Hair Shampoo into my hair care routine, I'm impressed by its performance and hair-nourishing qualities. This cleansing shampoo, packed in a 250ml bottle, stands out as a color-safe option that aligns with vegan and cruelty-free principles.The key feature of this shampoo is its pH maintenance, ensuring that it not only effectively cleanses but also helps to balance the pH levels of the hair. This is particularly beneficial for maintaining the health and vibrancy of color-treated hair. The formulation is gentle yet powerful, leaving my hair feeling clean without stripping away its natural moisture.Being vegan and cruelty-free is a significant plus for me. It aligns with my values, and I appreciate the commitment to ethical and sustainable practices in the beauty industry.The shampoo lathers well, and a little goes a long way, making it an economical choice. The absence of harsh chemicals and sulfates contributes to a pleasant and mild fragrance.While it comes at a slightly higher price point, the K18 Peptide Prep pH Maintenance Hair Shampoo's effectiveness in maintaining color, coupled with its ethical considerations, makes it a worthwhile investment for those seeking a quality, cruelty-free shampoo that promotes hair health.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: Only have to wash hair every few days now
reviews.reviewText: This product is amazing, i had very greasy hair, but on using this product ive noticed my hair lasts few days now... My hair feels so clean and no need for a condition, my hair seems to have the right balance now.. Smell is very nice too.. Im 53yrs old..
Très bon shampooing. J’ai des cheveux méchés et colorés et j’ai eu un très beau résultat. Je recommande.

Lo uso ormai da mesi in abbinamento al trattamento k18 che faccio 2/3 volte al mese.Ho capelli sottili e per me è stata una scoperta meravigliosa. I capelli sono più sani e meno “crespi”. Quando non faccio il trattamento k18, uso comunque questo shampoo delicato seguito da un normale conditioner

Desde el primer lavado se nota muchísimo el efecto de este champú , te deja el cuero cabelludo limpio y la melena brillante . Con una sola gota tamaño dos avellanas te sale una de espuma y mi melena es por debajo de los hombros . Estoy contenta lo voy alternando con otro champú
